attributes.action: provide greater protection for vulnerable people from postal scams
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A simple Google search can quickly point you in the direction of scam companies.  Reports of fraudulent activity go back for several years and yet these companies are still trading and still fleecing the more vulnerable members of society. Why doesn't the Government do something about shutting them down?  Instead, there are thousands of stories out their of elderly people who have responded to postal scams and now suffer problems associated with massive debt, physical and mental illness.
